text: The Tunisia national under-20 football team represents Tunisia in international football completions. They have played at the FIFA U-20 World Cup and the African Youth Championship since 1977. ==Competition records== Champions Runners-up Third place Fourth place *Red border color indicates tournament was held on home soil. ===FIFA U-20 World Cup record=== FIFA U-20 World Cup FIFA U-20 World Cup FIFA U-20 World Cup FIFA U-20 World Cup FIFA U-20 World Cup FIFA U-20 World Cup FIFA U-20 World Cup FIFA
